The religion of Christ never discourages the receiver. It is fitting him for the society of angels in heaven, and that is where we want to be. We want to be in that position where His light and love will shine upon us so that we can gather rays of light from glory and scatter them upon those around us.--Manuscript 84, 1886, pp. 3-9. (Sermon, September 26, 1886.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. August 1, 1979
